resume_workfield: I am currently working as a CTO for Orion
resume_description: I have been working in the web industry for 10 years. I am hands-on and have grown different products for entities (startups, companies, charities and public) from MVP to acquisition or handover. I worked on B2C, B2B and Back-office web applications. I thrive in fast paced products environments, and am keen on being user centric.
resume_content_experiences_current_produ: We leverage French Open Data to analyze students outcome in vocational education and derive impact KPIs for the training programs they completed. We allowed the needs of vocational high schools to emerge through their principals and built a workflow upon it to shape the vocational training offer in coherence with national ambitions (Ministries, Directorate General for School Education).

projects_description: Here are the personal projects in an active state. Not that I'm working on it everyday, but those I'm coming back from time to time.
projects_mtts_description: Deterministic API to manipulate music theory concepts
projects_corsica_description: Tool to merge and analyse GPX (XML path coordinates storage system)
projects_cooler_description: Tool to present color matching based on Wada Sanzo | A Dictionary of Color Combinations and data from https://sanzo-wada.dmbk.io/
mtts_pages_index_experiments_0_descripti: Build a scale from a root note
mtts_pages_index_experiments_1_descripti: A simple metronome based on ToneJS and webworkers
mtts_pages_index_research_text: I'm aiming to find new ways to create, teach, learn and discover music theory through experiments. This lab is based on MTTS Library (from my github) and Tonejs.
mtts_components_buildScale_scaleTitle: Voici les notes de la gamme majeure
corsica_components_nav_actions_merge_des: Merge multiple GPX files to create a new one and upload it on any website to anlayse (Strava, Komoot, etc.)
corsica_components_nav_actions_analyse_d: Analyse GPX file and get a map, crude data on speed and altitude.
corsica_pages_merge_fileInputRequired: You have to specify at least two GPX files
corsica_pages_merge_fileInputDescription: Drag and drop your GPX files here
corsica_pages_merge_description: You select a few activites in a GPX format and I will merge them into one. You will then be able to analyse it with the analyse tool or any other tool (Strava, Komoot, etc.)
corsica_pages_merge_inputLabel: Specify a name for your merged GPX activity
corsica_pages_merge_inputRequired: You have to specify an activity name
corsica_pages_analyse_fileInputLabel: Upload the GPX file you want to analyse
corsica_pages_analyse_fileInputDescripti: Drag and drop your GPX file here
corsica_pages_analyse_description: This tool allows you to import a GPX activity file and get a crude Strava like dashboard to analyse it. No file is ever stored.
corsica_pages_analyse_selectAFile: Alternatively you can use the files I saved for demo purposes. You can select one, nothing bad will happen :
corsica_pages_upload_fileInputLabel: Upload the GPX file to set as example
corsica_pages_upload_fileInputDescriptio: Drag and drop your GPX file here
